short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ensures pasted content stays within character limits to avoid attachments.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Have you tried to paste your entire code base into Claude, and it turned into an attachment?
Or tried to paste lots of text content, and it turns into attachments?
Look no further! Claude Paste will help you ensure that pasted content stays as text.

What are the benefits of this?
- Claude gives better quality responses for coding tasks when the code is in text. It takes more context into consideration is what I have found to be true.
